title: WTT for Cy Young and Mathewson
author: pitchernut

posts.post_title: WTT for Cy Young and Mathewson
posts.post_content: Would like to trade cards on my list for any pre-1915 Cy Young (except T206 glove showing) in the $100-150 range, and any pre 1915 Cristy Mathewson in the $100 range.  The list is too long to post here so email me at [url]jimoor@hotmail.com[/url] with "list" on subject line and I will send one out to you.  thanks
